categories: Category:Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi

nodes.text: Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 3

Dawn of the Jedi: Force War 3 is the third issue in Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi: Force War, the third story arc miniseries of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi comic book series by John Ostrander and Jan Duursema. Force War 3 was published by Dark Horse Comics on January 15, 2014.

Je'daii generals Daegen Lok and Xesh are captured by Xesh's former Rakatan masters, and Xesh learns the truth behind his arrival on Tython. Half-mad with regret, he is forced to give the invaders the knowledge they need to defeat Xesh's Je'daii friends—and enslave the entire planet!
